description: Loan Management Web Application - Flask-based authentication and user management system with loan calculation features. Accessible on localhost:80. The application has a login page, user profiles, and loan details management.

endpoints: /login (GET, POST) - Login endpoint, redirects to this from /
/total_loan_payments (GET) - AJAX endpoint for loan calculations, requires authentication
/error (GET) - Error page with error_type and error_message parameters
/static/ (GET) - Directory listing enabled for static files
details.authentication: Session-based (test:test credentials found in HTML comment)

notes: CRITICAL FINDING: TODO comment in login page reveals test credentials: username=test, password=test. Directory listing is enabled on /static/ which exposes template files and internal structure. The application appears to be a loan management system with user authentication and profile management capabilities.
